MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Half of a circle or of a circumference.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The stage was arranged in a perfect semicircle around the conductor.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 舞台以完美的半圆形围绕着指挥。
